Sequence Information.Function: Has bactericidal activity. Active against E.coli ML35 but not against S.aureus 502A.

Literature.Title: Expression of beta-defensin genes in bovine alveolar macrophages.
Literature.Author: Diamond G.,Bhat M.,Rhodes J.,Ryan L.K.

Literature.Title: Purification, primary structures, and antibacterial activities of beta-defensins, a new family of antimicrobial peptides from bovine neutrophils.
Literature.Author: Novotny M.J.,McGuire P.A.,Morris W.L.,Tang Y.-Q.,Selsted M.E.
